name: Inauguration of Puerto de la Plata, Argentina
obverse: A view of river with ships at the site of the port city. The sun is rising on the horizon. Cows and an anchor are in the foreground.
reverse: Inscription in 10 lines surrounded by a wreath.
reverse_inscriptions: LA PROVINCIA DE BUENOS AIRES LO INICIA EL 8 DE DICIEMBRE DE 1883 Y LO LIBRA AL COMERCIO DEL MUNDO EL 30 DE MARZO DE 1890
description: Puerto de la Plata is a port city in Argentina. Construction of the city commenced in 1883 and finished in 1890.
